en: #NAME, I feel like you've been ignoring me. I know your new business takes up a lot of your time, but you can't just wave me to the side because you're busy. Please spend some time with me.
"Thank you so much, honey. It's just... I've had a hard week, and when you're working so hard, I feel like I've got to handle everything by myself."
"It's just not the same as when we first started dating. I'm sorry. I'll try to get more used to it."
Did you listen to me at all?
